languages.text: "Мне плевать на надзирателей, каторжан и их проблемы, меня волнуют трупы. Кто их оставил — вот что важно. Если тела еще не уничтожены, можно было бы провести некоторые... гадания. Ритуал неаппетитный, но небрезгливый псайкер смог бы узнать больше о том, как они погибли".

"I don't care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — what bothers me is the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."
languages.original_text: "Мне плевать на надзирателей, каторжан и их проблемы, меня волнуют трупы. Кто их оставил — вот что важно. Если тела еще не уничтожены, можно было бы провести некоторые... гадания. Ритуал неаппетитный, но небрезгливый псайкер смог бы узнать больше о том, как они погибли".

traits.locale_text: "I do not care about the wardens, the convicts or their problem — I care about the dead bodies. Who had left them — that is the important question. If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct...a divination. The ritual is not very appetizing, but a psyker who is not squeamish could learn more about their death."

"I do not care about the wardens, the convicts or their problem — I care about the dead bodies. Who had left them — that is the important question. If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct...a divination. The ritual is not very appetizing, but a psyker who is not squeamish could learn more about their death."

"I don't care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — what bothers me is the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct...a divination. The ritual is not very appetising, but a psyker, not on the squeamish side, could learn more about their death."

If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct... a divination. The ritual is not very appetising, but a psyker, not on the squeamish side, could learn more about their death."

The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

languages.text: “我不关心监察员、囚犯，也不在乎他们的问题，我在乎的是那些尸体。那些尸体是谁留下来的？这是个重要的问题。如果尸体还没被销毁，那我们就可以进行……占卜。这样的仪式并不是很诱人，但一个没那么拘谨的灵能者，可以通过占卜进一步了解那些人死亡的信息。”
languages.original_text: "I do not care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — I care about the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct... a divination. The ritual is not very appetising, but a psyker, not on the squeamish side, could learn more about their death."

traits.locale_text: “我不关心监察员、囚犯，也不在乎他们的问题，我在乎的是那些尸体。那些尸体是谁留下来的？这是个重要的问题。如果尸体还没被销毁，那我们就可以进行……占卜。这样的仪式并不是很诱人，但一个没那么拘谨的灵能者，可以通过占卜进一步了解那些人死亡的信息。”

languages.text: «No me importan los supervisores, los presos ni sus problemas. Me importan los cadáveres. Quién los dejó, esa es la cuestión importante. Si los cuerpos aún no han sido destruidos, entonces podemos llevar a cabo... una adivinación. El ritual es bastante desagradable, pero un psíquico con pocos remilgos podría averiguar más acerca de sus muertes».
languages.original_text: "I don't care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — what bothers me is the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

traits.locale_text: «No me importan los supervisores, los presos ni sus problemas. Me importan los cadáveres. Quién los dejó, esa es la cuestión importante. Si los cuerpos aún no han sido destruidos, entonces podemos llevar a cabo... una adivinación. El ritual es bastante desagradable, pero un psíquico con pocos remilgos podría averiguar más acerca de sus muertes».

languages.text: 「看守や受刑者、奴らの問題には関心がない...遺体に興味があるんだ。誰が奴らを置き去りにしたのか...それが重要な問題だ。遺体がまだ破壊されていなければ...占術を行うことができる。この儀式はあまり興味をそそるものではないが、潔癖でない異能者なら、奴らの死について詳しく知ることができるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I do not care about the wardens, the convicts, or their problems — I care about the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct...a divination. The ritual is not very appetising, but a psyker, not on the squeamish side, could learn more about their death."

traits.locale_text: 「看守や受刑者、奴らの問題には関心がない...遺体に興味があるんだ。誰が奴らを置き去りにしたのか...それが重要な問題だ。遺体がまだ破壊されていなければ...占術を行うことができる。この儀式はあまり興味をそそるものではないが、潔癖でない異能者なら、奴らの死について詳しく知ることができるだろう」

languages.text: « Je me moque bien des contremaîtres, des détenus ou de leurs problèmes. Ce sont les cadavres, qui m'inquiètent, et la personne qui les a trucidés ! Si les corps n'ont pas encore été détruits, nous pourrions effectuer... une divination. Je sais, c'est un rituel peu ragoûtant, mais un psyker à l'estomac bien accroché pourrait en apprendre davantage sur leurs derniers instants. »
languages.original_text: "I don't care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — what bothers me is the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

traits.locale_text: « Je me moque bien des contremaîtres, des détenus ou de leurs problèmes. Ce sont les cadavres, qui m'inquiètent, et la personne qui les a trucidés ! Si les corps n'ont pas encore été détruits, nous pourrions effectuer... une divination. Je sais, c'est un rituel peu ragoûtant, mais un psyker à l'estomac bien accroché pourrait en apprendre davantage sur leurs derniers instants. »

languages.text: "Die Wärter sind mir gleich, die Sträflinge, ihre Probleme — mich interessieren nur die Leichen. Wer sie zurückgelassen hat, das ist die wichtige Frage. Wenn die Leichen noch nicht vernichtet sin, dann können wir eine ... Prophetie durchführen. Das Ritual ist nicht sonderlich erbaulich, aber ein Psioniker, der nicht zimperlich ist, könnte mehr über ihren Tod in Erfahrung bringen."
languages.original_text: "I do not care about the wardens, the convicts, or their problems — I care about the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies are not destroyed yet, then we can conduct...a divination. The ritual is not very appetising, but a psyker, not on the squeamish side, could learn more about their death."

traits.locale_text: "Die Wärter sind mir gleich, die Sträflinge, ihre Probleme — mich interessieren nur die Leichen. Wer sie zurückgelassen hat, das ist die wichtige Frage. Wenn die Leichen noch nicht vernichtet sin, dann können wir eine ... Prophetie durchführen. Das Ritual ist nicht sonderlich erbaulich, aber ein Psioniker, der nicht zimperlich ist, könnte mehr über ihren Tod in Erfahrung bringen."

languages.text: "Gözetmenler, hükümlüler ya da dertleri umurumda değil. Benim aklımı kurcalayan ölüler. Failleri kim? Önemli olan soru bu. Cesetler henüz yok edilmediyse... Bir çeşit kehanet ayini gerçekleştirebiliriz. Ayinin kendisi pek hoş olmasa da iradesi kuvvetli bir ruhsezer, ölümlere ilişkin daha çok bilgi edinebilir."
languages.original_text: "I don't care about the overseers, the convicts, or their problems — what bothers me is the dead bodies. Who left them — that is the important question. If the bodies haven't been destroyed yet, then we could conduct a certain kind of... divination. The ritual is less than appetising, but a psyker with a strong stomach could learn more about their deaths."

traits.locale_text: "Gözetmenler, hükümlüler ya da dertleri umurumda değil. Benim aklımı kurcalayan ölüler. Failleri kim? Önemli olan soru bu. Cesetler henüz yok edilmediyse... Bir çeşit kehanet ayini gerçekleştirebiliriz. Ayinin kendisi pek hoş olmasa da iradesi kuvvetli bir ruhsezer, ölümlere ilişkin daha çok bilgi edinebilir."
